title: Regional grids, towers, gantries, switchyards, control room, Relay room for transmission, distribution, etc
clause_text: Regional grids, towers, gantries, switchyards, control room, Relay room for transmission, distribution, etc. of electricity; Any other essential public services as may be notified by the State Government.
